name: Under Plunder
description:
Under Plunder takes place in a futuristic civilization in another planet. Leaving Earth was the only option for survival, 500 years have passed and all boils down to the technology developed with misterious crystals found on our new home. This new energy source can power weapons and flying ships known as navians. Help gather all the crystals and avoid pirate attacks in a new age of exploration.

Currently there is only 1 level playable. All the information about the gameplay is inside the game in the 'Tutorial' section from menu. Have fun and feedback is much appreciated!
